epic.title: User Authentication and Security
epic.description: Develop and integrate secure mechanisms for user authentication and protection of personal data in the e-commerce platform.

stories.title: Implement User Authentication System
stories.description: As a user, I want to securely register, log in, and log out so that my personal data is protected and I can access my account.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can register with email and password.
Users can log in successfully with valid credentials.
Users can log out successfully from any session.
Passwords are stored using industry-standard hashing algorithms (e.g., bcrypt or Argon2).
Account is locked after 5 consecutive failed login attempts.
Users can reset their password via email verification link.

tasks.title: Design authentication database schema
tasks.description: Create the necessary user table with secure password fields and account lock status tracking.

tasks.title: Implement user registration endpoint
tasks.description: Develop API for new user creation with input validation and password hashing.

tasks.title: Implement login endpoint
tasks.description: Develop API to authenticate users and generate secure session tokens.

tasks.title: Implement logout endpoint
tasks.description: Develop API to invalidate user tokens and end sessions.

tasks.title: Implement password reset functionality
tasks.description: Add password reset request and verification flow using email service provider.

tasks.title: Add account lock mechanism
tasks.description: Track failed login attempts and lock user account after 5 failed attempts.

tasks.title: Ensure compliance with GDPR and OWASP security guidelines
tasks.description: Review authentication system for regulatory and security best practices.

tasks.title: Deploy and test system uptime
tasks.description: Verify system maintains uptime of 99.9% for authentication service.

notes: Revised per feedback: add more prorities
